citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:30 AM on
15-Mar-18.
The inspector arrived at 9:30 AM on 3/15/18 to conduct an inspection but there was no one on the premises. The
inspector contacted the Licensee by phone and learned that he/she was at a distant off-site location and was not
available to accompany the inspector on an inspection.
An AWA compliance inspection could not be conducted because there was no other facility representative available
to accompany the inspector.
Correct from this date forward by providing inspector with hours of availability.
NOTE - This is the FIRST attempted inspection of this Licensee. Report delivered by e-mail 3/16/18.
*END OF REPORT*

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:30 AM on
15-Mar-18.
The inspector arrived at 9:30 AM on 3/15/18 to conduct an inspection but there was no one on the premises. The
inspector contacted the Licensee by phone and learned that he/she was at a distant off-site location and was not
available to accompany the inspector on an inspection.
An AWA compliance inspection could not be conducted because there was no other facility representative available
to accompany the inspector.
Correct from this date forward by providing inspector with hours of availability.
NOTE - This is the FIRST attempted inspection of this Licensee. Report delivered by e-mail 3/16/18.
*END OF REPORT*
